description: Transfers Airport Hotel - Airport Hotel: only for people who arrive on February 5 and 6 and return on February 12 and 13, 2023. People who arrive before or return after the indicated dates do not include transfers.

Lodging at a 5-star hotel, “Hotel las Américas” from February 6 to 12, 2023, 6 nights and 7 days. After exhausting this hotel, the organization will designate the second official hotel of the event, of the same category. Transfers Airport Hotel - Airport Hotel: only for people who arrive on February 5 and 6 and return on February 12 and 13, 2023. People who arrive before or return after the indicated dates are not included transfers.
Full meals: breakfast, lunch and dinner, buffet style within the facilities at the times established by the hotel.
Full Pass - Concert, Parties, Workshops, Conferences, Competition, Grand Final, Ultimate Championship, Music Park Fest, Pool Parties, Beaches, Gym.
For the purchase of the all-inclusive plan, competitors receive one (1) category at no cost.
If you want to compete in more than one category, you must buy additional categories.
VIP entrance to see the competition.
Priority to use the main stage to rehearse your choreography.
VIP kit with additional surprises to the one that the other attendees will receive.

termsAndConditions: For the purchase of the all-inclusive plan, competitors receive one (1) category at no cost.
If you want to compete in more than one category, you must buy additional categories.
All attendees and all competitors of the WLDC 2023 must purchase an all-inclusive plan and stay at the official hotel of the competition, Hotel Las Américas Cartagena, Colombia.
All competitors and companions must stay at the official hotel of the event without exception.
All competitors and companions must purchase the all-inclusive plan and the additional categories only through the official application of the event.
After five (5) days have elapsed, no refund will be made for the purchase of additional WLDC 2023 categories.

terms: People will be able to pay in an installment plan that will be available at the time of payment, this installment plan will only go on the payment dates that are needed.Example, on the first payment date it can be paid in 4 installments, on the second payment date it can be paid in three installments and on the third payment date it can be paid only in two installment.
When paying in installments, the price is automatically frozen as long as it meets the payment deadlines.

Payments must be made before the due date. Otherwise, you will lose the benefit of freezing the price and you will have to pay at the price that is currently in force according to the price date and the system will automatically charge you the remaining value.
After five (5) days have elapsed, no money will be returned from payments for installments that have been made and that are not going to be fulfilled (Article 47 of Law 1480 of 2011).
It is not accepted to use payments made in installments in part of payments of other installments or new purchases.

IMPORTANT NOTE: the registered (participants and companions) at the time of registering and paying the registration, declare that they know the REGULATIONS OF THE CONTEST and undertake to abide by it.
